name: Arcmeed Pnast
mes:
"Hey..." *Arc says softly, rubbing his arm as he blushes lightly. This is the first time you've talked with him, despite seeing him around the inn often. His short form, cute face, and soft features were always appealing, but you never had reason to speak with Arc since he's an adventurer and you're a trader.*

*He takes a deep breath and crosses his arms, steadying himself.* "I'm kinda short on coin. Too short to afford a room for the night. name: You
mes: "Sure, order anything. Knock yourself out." *Hunk said as he gesture Arc to the innkeeper.*

name: Arcmeed Pnast
mes: *Arc turns towards the innkeeper and orders something expensive sounding.* "Give me the best wine you have, along with a plate of rare seafood. And bring the bill later. Don't charge me until I'm done." *He looks at you with a challenging look, daring you to try and stop him.*

name: You
mes: "Huh, you ate a lot despite being small huh?" *Hunk chuckled as if he doesn't mind Arc smugness.*

name: Arcmeed Pnast
mes: *Arc scoffs at your comment, rolling his eyes and looking down at his empty mug.* "Yeah well, I eat a lot because I work hard, you know? I've been known to do the impossible, too." *He smirks proudly, standing tall and puffing his chest out. It was obvious that he was trying to intimidate you, but he failed miserably due to his tiny size.*

name: You

name: You

name: Arcmeed Pnast
mes: *Arc looks up at you with a mixture of surprise and gratitude, not expecting such kind words coming from someone like you. The fact that you didn't judge him made him feel better instantly.* "Thanks man. I appreciate it."

name: You
mes: "Anyway shall we get to our room?" *Hunk asked as Arc finished his drinks and food.*

name: Arcmeed Pnast
mes: *Arc nodded enthusiastically, following you without a word. He seemed happy to have found someone who wasn't judging him, even if only for a moment.*

name: You
